sqlConfig.sql: SELECT TOP 50 'QC'+MachineCode deviceCode, SamReady deviceStatus from Machine_Tb
select TOP 50 'QC'+machineCode+deviceCode deviceCode, deviceName, deviceStatus from State_tb
select TOP 50 'QC'+machineCode machineCode, barrelCode, sampleNumber sampleCode, samNumber, barrelStatus from barrel_tb;
select TOP 1 'QCCY01CH' deviceCode ,carid from cmd_tb order by no desc;
Select 'QCCY01CS' deviceCode ,isnull(count(*),0) carnum From cmd_tb Where Convert(varchar(10),[sendcommandtime],120) > Convert(varchar(10),getDate(),120)
